system.description:
When you need to get somewhere out of reach or out of sight, tell us where you're going and roll +Grace.

If you have the Clumsy tag, you take -1 to Get Away.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value: The Overlord gets to make a @UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.overlord.JournalEntry.Wspo5QWJyqQdielu.JournalEntryPage.PBTrM0AWIri4ICZJ]{Cut} against you!Â

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
Choose one:

  • You get there quickly, avoiding any harm along the way.
  • You get there quietly, drawing no attention.
  • You grab someone nearby and bring them with you.

success.label: Success!
success.value:
Choose two:

  • You get there quickly, avoiding any harm along the way.
  • You get there quietly, drawing no attention.
  • You grab someone nearby and bring them with you.
